query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZQMT043 ( MANDT ,LIFNR ,POSID ,ITEM ,ZSITE_NM ,ZQNTY ,EXITEM1 ,EXITEM2 ,EXITEM3 ,EXITEM4 ,EXITEM5 ,EXITEM6 ,EXITEM7 ,EXITEM8 ,EXITEM9 ,PARQDT ,PAPRDT ,PAPRID ,PACFDT ,RSLT ,GUBUN ,CDATE ,CNAME ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# ,#LIFNR# ,#POSID# ,#ITEM# ,#ZSITE_NM# ,1 ,#EXITEM1# ,#EXITEM2# ,#EXITEM3# ,#EXITEM4# ,#EXITEM5# ,#EXITEM6# ,#EXITEM7# ,#EXITEM8# ,#EXITEM9# ,#PARQDT# ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,#G_USER_ID# )
